description:
New Course Published May 17, 2016 Hi I’m Empowerment Expert Louise Anne Maurice and Today I would like to help you become an Empowered Project Manager who knows precisely how to deal with complainers.

  1. Are you frustrated with Team Members who constantly complain and bring the rest of the Team down?
  2. Do you fear that their complaining will impact your ability to get the project done on-time and under-budget?
  3. Do you struggle with knowing how to deal with the Team Member who complains about the work you are asking them to do?

Then You Are In the Right Place because my BRAND NEW COURSE is for you!

REALITY - Sometimes you have no control over selecting your team – you walk into the unknown.

I have helped many Project Managers, just like you, feel competent working with a diverse, and sometimes unknown, Team.

With me as your guide, you will experience less stress and more confidence dealing with difficult team members

2 parts high-level training seminar and 3 parts hands-on workshop, I developed this course to be a $199 value

You learn part eight of my GET RESULTS Soft Skills Training Program.

By the end of course 8, you’ll know how to implement proven techniques that almost guarantees your success; you learn how to increase this ration in the course.

I show you how to deal with team members who constantly complain without sacrificing what you are successful at – Managing Projects from start to finish.  

The usual approach to developing a motivated and productive team doesn’t work with certain team members and once you know this, you can move past any blocks that are stopping you from having an engaged team.   

In this course I walk you through my two part in-depth Chain Reaction Framework for dealing with complainers. 

I then show you exactly how to apply this framework to my motivation methods; these are methods that you won’t learn anywhere else.

My motivation methods work even with the toughest team members – you learn about the 2 most challenging.

This course is ideal if you want the simple blueprint and an easy step-by-step plan to follow that makes you look like a people management guru.

Plus you receive my empower formula to help you develop an engaged productive team.

As a bonus, you walk away with a 57 page manual to keep as your guide plus lifetime access to coaching and consulting – all from your one-time low course enrollment fee. 

Remember, this course is NO RISK.  There is a 30 Day 100% MONEY BACK REFUND.

Check out some of the FREE PREVIEWS available to learn more about how this course turns you into a highly sought-after Project Manager.

Then click on the “Take This Course” button and start learning instantly how to turn complainers into engaged productivity superstars.
title: Empowered Project Manager8: New Part 8 Soft Skills Training
